answers.author: Evelina Moulder
answers.text:
Hello Bill,
ICMA is in the process of collecting data on service delivery for 2012, so I can't provide the latest, but the results from 2007 show that both Grant and Sparks, NV, contracted for snow removal in 2007.  They may still be contracting and have probably issued more recent RFPs, so contacting them might be helpful. If you need more examples of local governments that have contracted for snow removal let me know (emoulder@icma.org).
Best,  
Evelina

author: Bill Oroszi
text:
We are in the process of developing a bid spec for outsourcing snow and ice control / removal. Does anybody have an example of a current bid spec for this type of service. We are located in Northern Nevada and currently are responsible for about 2,300 lane miles. If possible would like your response by end of August 2012.
Thanks, for your time and response!
title: Outsourcing Snow removal
